meanings.definition: A sibling from the same litter.
meanings.sent1: My cat and her littermates play together every day.
meanings.sent2: The littermates of the puppy were all adopted by different families.
meanings.sent3: The littermates had a race to see who could reach the food bowl first.
meanings.sent4: Growing up together, the littermates shared a special bond that lasted a lifetime.
meanings.sent5: The littermates cuddled together for warmth on cold nights.

meanings.definition: Animals born at the same time from the same mother.
meanings.sent1: The littermates of the ducklings followed their mother closely.
meanings.sent2: The littermates of the kittens all had similar fur patterns.
meanings.sent3: The littermates had a reunion party to celebrate their birthdays.
meanings.sent4: The littermates swam together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The littermates napped together under the shade of a tree.
